Summary: me and my ex where going do road she noticed the light ,then as she told me i noticed the light,then it was on top of the car
divs: Sighting DetailsOn a country road in Richmond in ,we where,my ex girlfriend and myself,she felt this was part of a series of events,we where arguing about whitlet streibers book transformations and she noticed a light travlling off the road to the south,i was driving,so I had to peek and look back at road and at the light,as I looked at light then back at road,...it was that quickly over the moving car.It stayed over us going down the road for some time until I noticed a car approaching in the opposite direction,we then left that area,and drove to another part of the town,she keep insistening that it was still following us, and that she had just saw behind yhe trees,as I went around the bend,i saw the ufo,just sitting there in the sky.i turned sound snd left the area. My ex tells a story more detailed and longer,with more interaction with something..please this is to me just the tip of the iceberg.
